abstract: Rules should be changed so that defensive players don't feel comfortable committing flagrant personal fouls on point-afters.
snippet: Rules should be changed so that defensive players don't feel comfortable committing flagrant personal fouls on point-afters.
lead_paragraph: Brian Robison's cheap shot on Packers guard T.J. Lang on Sunday exposed two flaws in the N.F.L. rule book.

headline.main: Robison's Cheap Shot Requires a Rethinking of the Rules
